<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_email"><sys_script_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>x_cdltd_loaner_req_loaner_request_script_1</name><new_lines_to_html>false</new_lines_to_html><script><![CDATA[if (current.item_type == 'cmdb_ci_computer') {
        var request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
        request.setEndpoint('https://nowlearning-nlinst02387995-0001.lab.service-now.com/api/now/table/u_password_vault?sysparm_query=u_asset%3D' + current.cmdb_ci.asset_tag + '&sysparm_fields=u_password&sysparm_limit=1');
        request.setHttpMethod('GET');
        //Eg. UserName="admin", Password="admin" for this code sample.
        var user = 'admin';
        var password = 'admin';
        request.setBasicAuth(user, password);
        request.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
        var response = request.execute();
      
        var obj = JSON.parse(response.getBody());
        var myPass = obj.result[0].password;
        gs.info('u_password: ' + myPass);
    }]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_email</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-01-22 22:07:07</sys_created_on><sys_id>229b4dc1749712107f44e86ba88d0a1b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_cdltd_loaner_req_loaner_request_script_1</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Loaner Request" source="x_cdltd_loaner_req">224958bbd0c312107f444f730adb17cd</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Request">224958bbd0c312107f444f730adb17cd</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_email_229b4dc1749712107f44e86ba88d0a1b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-01-22 22:07:07</sys_updated_on></sys_script_email></record_update>
